vacuum-cleaners.name: Dyson Cyclone V10 Absolute
vacuum-cleaners.description: Big machine suction power. But with cord-free versatility. The Dyson Cyclone V10 Absolute cord-free vacuum has a bigger bin for the big cleans. The torque drive cleaner head removes more dust from carpets. The soft roller cleaner head removes fine dust and large debris from hard floors. The Dyson Cyclone V10 Absolute cord-free vacuum quickly transforms to a handheld for quick clean ups, spot cleaning and cleaning difficult places.

vacuum-cleaners.name: Shark Navigator Lift-Away Professional
vacuum-cleaners.description: The Shark Navigator Lift-Away Professional is a versatile and powerful upright vacuum cleaner that can be easily converted into a portable canister vacuum.
features: Brushroll shutoff for bare floor cleaning

vacuum-cleaners.description: The iRobot Roomba 675 is a budget-friendly robot vacuum cleaner that is equipped with a powerful motor and intelligent navigation.

Cyclonic cleaning technology for powerful suction

vacuum-cleaners.description: The Black+Decker Flex Vacuum is a cordless stick vacuum cleaner that features a powerful motor and a high-efficiency filtration system.

vacuum-cleaners.description: The Electrolux UltraFlex Canister Vacuum is a versatile and powerful canister vacuum cleaner that features a high-efficiency filtration system and a flexible hose.

features: Quick Flip crevice tool for cleaning tight spaces

Integrated tools for cleaning crevices and upholstery

vacuum-cleaners.name: Vacmaster Wet/Dry Vacuum
vacuum-cleaners.description: The Vacmaster Wet/Dry Vacuum is a versatile and powerful vacuum cleaner that can be used for both wet and dry cleaning.

vacuum-cleaners.name: Eufy RoboVac 30C MAX
vacuum-cleaners.description: The Eufy RoboVac 30C MAX is a budget-friendly robot vacuum cleaner that is equipped with a powerful motor and intelligent navigation.
features: Compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant

vacuum-cleaners.name: Bissell PowerGlide Pet Vacuum
vacuum-cleaners.description: Every pet parent knows that pets make messes. That's why SuctionChannel Technology provides edge-to-edge suction to remove embedded pet hair and deep-down dirt. Plus, swivel steering helps maneuver around furniture and obstacles in your home easily. Pets don't discriminate where they make their messes, but thanks to the On/Off Triple Action Brush Roll feature, this vacuum has two bristle types for carpet and scatter-free hard surface cleaning. Use the stretch hose and tools to clean above-the-floor spaces such as furniture, stairs, curtains, and pet beds. And don't worry, the Pet TurboEraser Tool with Tangle-Free Technology is designed so that hair is less likely to wrap around the brush roll. When the job is complete, an Easy Empty Dirt Bin makes for an easy, mess-free cleanup. All of this makes the BISSELL PowerGlide Pet Upright Vacuum a super-powerful solution for any pet parent.

vacuum-cleaners.name: Sanitaire SC3683A Commercial Upright Vacuum Cleaner
vacuum-cleaners.description: This compact Sanitaire commercial vacuum is a great option for cleaning bare floor and flat carpet. The lightweight design, built off of the Mighty Mite style, makes it easily portable and maneuverable. An included carrying strap allows the user to move the vacuum from room to room with ease, or hold the vacuum while cleaning stairs. This vacuum cleaner is especially useful for those needing a compact or lightweight commercial vacuum. Unlike traditional upright vacuums this commercial canister allows the operator to clean under furniture and other areas where most uprights can't fit.  Once finished the 20' power cord neatly wraps up underneath the vacuum for storage.
features: The weight of the vacuum only is 10 pounds
20' power cord that wraps up underneath

vacuum-cleaners.name: Hoover T-Series WindTunnel Rewind Plus Upright Vacuum Cleaner
vacuum-cleaners.description: The Hoover T-Series WindTunnel Rewind Plus Vacuum Cleaner is a powerful and versatile upright vacuum cleaner that features a high-capacity dustbin and a no-scuff bumper.
features: No-scuff bumper to protect furniture and walls

vacuum-cleaners.name: Dyson Ball Animal 2 Total Clean Vacuum Cleaner
vacuum-cleaners.description: Strongest suction of any vacuum. Suction tested to ASTM F558 at the cleaner head, dust-loaded against upright market. Dyson technology helps create a cleaner, healthier home - Our vacuums and purifiers are scientifically proven to capture particles.
